# ProcessRemark { #brdr.enums.ProcessRemark }

```python
enums.ProcessRemark()
```

Status remarks added to processed features for auditing and debugging.

## Attributes {.doc-section .doc-section-attributes}

| Name                                   | Type         | Description                                                                               |
|----------------------------------------|--------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| RESULT_UNCHANGED                       | [str](`str`) | The alignment did not change the geometry (within tolerance).                             |
| INPUT_CIRCLE                           | [str](`str`) | A circle was detected; input returned to prevent geometric distortion.                    |
| RESULT_EMPTY_RETURNED                  | [str](`str`) | The processing resulted in an empty geometry.                                             |
| CHANGED_GEOMETRYTYPE_EMPTY_RETURNED    | [str](`str`) | Processing changed the geometry type (e.g. Polygon to Line), which is treated as invalid. |
| CHANGED_AMOUNT_GEOMETRIES              | [str](`str`) | The number of parts in a Multi-geometry has changed.                                      |
| NO_PREDICTION_ORIGINAL_RETURNED        | [str](`str`) | No suitable prediction found; falling back to original.                                   |
| MULTIPLE_PREDICTIONS_ORIGINAL_RETURNED | [str](`str`) | Ambiguous result due to multiple predictions.                                             |
| NOT_EVALUATED_ORIGINAL_RETURNED        | [str](`str`) | Evaluation criteria not met.                                                              |
